title: Best Prime Day Alternative Sales You Still Have Time to Shop from Target, Nordstrom, Walmart & More
summary: We’ve collected a list of some of the best Prime Day alternatives online.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Amazon Prime Day is one of the biggest online sales of the year, but there are plenty of other alternative sales to shop as well. Although Prime Day ends Oct. 8, several retailers are offering competing sales, some of which run throughout the month. Related QVC’s Black Friday in July: Shop the Top 5 Jewelry Deals With Up to 58% Off This $18 Amazon Antenna Lets You Access ABC, NBC & Other TV Channels for Free 50 Prime Day Deals to Kickoff Your Holiday Shopping: Save on Apple, Levi's and Dyson For bargain hunters who have been waiting all year to score deep discounts on essentials — and maybe even a few items worth splurging on — we’ve collected a list of some of the better Prime Day alternatives floating online. See more below.
